## ts-log-adapter-gulplog package

An adapter for the ts-log interface that pushes logging to gulplog with optional arguments JSON encoded.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [GulpLogLogger](./ts-log-adapter-gulplog.gulploglogger.md) | <code>gulplog</code> logging adapter. |
